Desc.entry: A partnership between Sheffield City Council Environmental Planning, Sheffield Countryside Conservation Trust, North Sheffield Conservation Group, Steel Valley Project (see separate entry) and Shire Brook Valley Conservation Group. Works with local communities and schools to improve the environment for people and wildlife. Develops new footpaths, cycle routes and green wildlife corridor links between communities and the wider countryside. Provides volunteering opportunities at Wood Lane Countryside Centre (see separate entry). Carries out environmental education, arts activities and skills training for volunteers.
